data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tian, Mingyi, Huang, Sunbin, Wang, Dianmei (2017): Discovery of a most remarkable cave-specialized trechine beetle from southern China (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae). ZooKeys 725: 37-47, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.725.21040, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.725.21040
